Posts.Content: Hi summer holiday Glad to hear your lashes are growing back and you've got stubbly bits on your hair.  I'm really hoping to keep any hair that I've got left.  If not, I'm grateful I kept it as long as I did.  Thanks for your reply  Good luck with everything  Kaz xx
Posts.Title: Docetaxel and hair loss

Posts.Content: Hi  Has anyone found any difference in hair/eyelash loss between fec and docetaxel? I'm about to have my last fec and I've still got hair but with bald patches And still have eyelashes. Does docetaxel make your hair grow or make it thinner? Also has anyone found more side effects with the last 4 cycles or is it slightly easier? As I've had very few side effects with fec.  Kaz
Posts.Title: Docetaxel and hair loss

Posts.Content: Hi jammyR Thanks so much for your reply. That really helps.  Good luck with all yours  Kaz xx
Posts.Title: Docetaxel and hair loss

Posts.Content: Thank you. That's great to hear those positive stories about your friends.
Posts.Title: Tumour didnt shrink. Finished chemo

Posts.Content: Thank you. That really helps me feel more positive.
Posts.Title: Tumour didnt shrink. Finished chemo

Posts.Content: Hi  I'm triple negative and finished 8 cycles of chemo on the 7th of August. The tumour didn't shrink at all.  Did anyone else find this to be the case? Op is in a few weeks but I'm going to see the doctor next Friday as I've got a sore armpit on the opposite side to my tumour with on one cancerous lymph node on the tumour side. Thanks Kaz
Posts.Title: Tumour didnt shrink. Finished chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Dayityrose  Thanks for your reply. That really helps. I'm just so worried being triple negative as it spreads so quick.  Glad you're all ok after 3 years. I hope I'll be helping somebody like you've helped me.  Kaz x
